artist: Artist: Ogata Gekkō; Publisher: Takekawa Risaburō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; naval battle scene; large ship with billowing black smoke coming out of stack on right; row boat in the water, filled with sailors; several struggling bodies in the water in the bottom center and LLQ; billowing white smoke and overturned boats in center left; burning ship in ULC; band of text in top center in Japanese characters
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Sino-Japanese War (Nisshin sensō 日清戰争)
title: Picture of the Great Japanese Victory at a Navy Battle
